column1: starts with a length ball around off, Fernando gets behind the line and offers a solid defence
just a little bit fuller around the fourth-stump line, defended again bu the batsman
fuller and wider outside off on this occasion, Fernando comes forward before deciding it's too far away and lets it go
on the stumps this time, length ball and angling towards middle and leg, flicked away towards deep-backward square leg for a couple, off the mark
length ball around off, looks to flick it away but the ball hits the outer half of the bat and lobs just over the bowler's head
length ball around middle and leg, defended on the leg side with a straight bat
starts with a fuller one around off, Karunaratne comes forward and drives it towards long-off and gets off the mark
length around off, not much spin there, Fernando comes forward and blocks
fuller on the stumps this time and driven past the bowler, long-on keeps it to one
length ball around off, chipped uppishly towards mid-off but the fielder is deep and Fernando survives the sluggishness of the wicket
fuller and driven down the ground for one more
length outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards point

length ball on middle and angling towards the pads, Fernando goes for the flick but misses and is struck on the pads. An appeal for lbw but think this is going down. Given not-out but Tamim wants to review it. Pitched just outside off, but was angling so much that even the impact was outside the leg stump. Bangladesh lose their review
length ball around middle and leg, Fernando works it towards the right of mid-on for a couple
length ball around off, comes forward and taps it towards short midwicket and scampers through for a quick single
length ball outside off, Karunaratne uses the angle and plays it late for a single to third man

loose shot by Fernando, was a length ball outside off and Fernando cannot resist chasing it, gets a thick outside edge and Soumya Sarkar takes a well-judged catch at first slip, chest-height to his right
length ball around off, comes forward and taps it towards extra cover
fuller around off and driven towards long-off for an easy single
length ball, angling in to the left-hander who pushes at it, gets an inside edge behind square on the leg side, was looking to steal a run but sent back in time by his partner
length ball outside off, punches it towards covers off the back foot, finds the fielder
uses feet to reach the pitch of the ball and drives it towards long-off
fuller around off and worked towards long-off once more
looks to skip down the ground but cannot reach to the pitch of the ball, thrusts his bat and pad forward to keep it out
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it through covers, a bit of a misfield by Sabbir at extra cover and that's the first boundary of the day
length ball but way too outside off, and that's the first wide of the day as well
length ball around off, was looking to play straighter but the angle across the batsman forces a thick outside edge towards point
short of length outside off, looks to get on the top of the bounce but mistimes it towards covers
length ball on the stumps, flicks it towards short midwicket for one
length ball outside off, Perera comes forward and slaps it past the cover fielder for the second boundary of the over, was a cutter from the bowler
short of length outside off, comes forward and pulls it towards short midwicket where Soumya makes a diving stop to prevent any runs
fuller around off, comes forward and defends it under his eyes
brings out the reverse sweep now that slip has vanished, was a length ball and Karunaratne collects a couple of runs to third man
flatter and quicker this time, angling in towards the batsman who taps it past short midwicket for one
flatter and angling in around off, Perera goes back and punches it past the backward point fielder for his second four
uses his feet this time to work this towards long-off to rotate the strike
fuller on the stumps, Karunaratne takes his front leg out and drives it firmly, past the mid-on fielder for four more
starts with a length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg
length ball, once again on the pads and whipped away towards deep square leg for another single
short of length around middle and leg, Perera gets on his toes and taps it towards square leg
short and pulled away behind square with no mercy by Perera, once again on the pads and this time Rubel pays the price
swivels again to collect another boundary, the angle also helping this time, was a short ball angling in and Perera unleashes another pull
short of length outside off, stays on the back foot and defends
fuller on the stumps, Karunaratne drives it towards mid-on and sets off, makes it easily in the end

down the wicket and looks to go towards midwicket, misses and is hit on the pad, an appeal for lbw but not-out. Bangladesh don't have a review, replays show the impact was just around the off stump and would have been umpire's call and therefore, not-out
short and wide outside off and cut it away hard in front of square for another four
and again, another short delivery, enough room for Perera to rock back and cut it to the left of the point fielder, Sri Lanka are cruising at the moment
length ball on the stumps, Perera comes down the ground but has to defend in the end
fuller on the stumps, too full in fact, Perera digs it out back towards Mehidy
fuller on the stumps, Karunaratne shows some aggression here, skips down and drives it past the mid-on fielder
in blockhole this time, digs it back towards the bowler
uses his feet once again and chips it over the vacant midwicket area for another boundary
short of length outside off, punched towards covers off the back foot
fuller and driven down the wicket once again but mid-on is deep now and keeps it to one
length ball on the pads, Perera looks to half-pull half-sweep it but fails to connect and is struck on the pads
length ball around off, stands tall in the crease and taps it towards mid-on
fuller but down the leg side and going further away from the keeper who gets a bit of glove on it but the fine leg is inside the circle and that's five wides
length ball around off, steered towards third man for an easy single
short and on the pads and Perera brings out another pull for four more to deep backward square leg
fuller around off and driven handsomely through covers this time, no-fielder-moved boundary
fuller and wider again but Perera looks to hit it too hard this time and messes up the placement, straight towards extra cover
a slower one around off, pushes it towards mid-off from the front foot
fuller around off, driven towards long-off for one
short of length outside off, goes back to cut but ends up chipping it uppishly but luckily in the gap, deep extra cover cuts it off
length ball around off, goes for the cut but misses
flatter on the stumps, punches it towards sweeper cover for one
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards long-on for one
short of length around off and middle, goes back and punches it towards sweeper cover for another single
length ball around off, goes for the cut and misses as the ball just comes back and sneaks in under the bat

and gone! But wait, Perera wants to review it. It was a length ball again and coming back in, goes past the inside edge as Perera looks to cut it. No spike, clear daylight between the bat and the ball on replay and Perera stays
length ball and angling away from the batsman this time, Perera goes for the drive and gets beaten again
fuller on the pads and flicked away towards fine leg for one
length ball around off, a bit of shape in after landing to beat the tentative forward push
back of length outside off, punched towards extra cover off the back foot
fuller on the stumps, driven back towards the bowler
length ball around off, punched towards extra cover, a fumble there allows a single
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards long-off
length ball around off, punched towards extra cover and another fumble by the substitute fielder Bijoy there
length ball around off, pushes it towards off side
length but down the leg side, goes down on one knee and sweeps it past short fine leg
short of length outside off, chops it into the ground, gets a single as the ball dribbles towards third man
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg for one more
length ball outside off, stays back and steers it towards the left of third man
fuller outside off, Perera comes forward and nonchalantly smashes it past mid-off for four, moves to 49
fuller but this time down the leg side, 100 comes up for Sri Lanka with that wide
another glorious drive to get to his fifty. Pitched up once more, Perera was already on the front foot and drives it past the mid-off, to the fielder's right this time
another wide down the leg side, Shafiul seems to have lost his radar here
fuller around middle, comes forward and pushes it towards short midwicket
length ball on the stumps, goes back and punches it towards long-off
length ball around off, comes forward and defends with bat and pad close
short of length but angling in on to the stumps, Karunaratne goes back and punches it towards extra cover
tossed up a touch, comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
length outside off, goes for the cut but cannot beat the point fielder
finally the dot-ball pressure gets to Karunaratne who goes for the sweep shot to fuller one around off but gets a top edge and a comfortable catch for Mustafizur Rahman at short fine leg
length on off stump, defended solidly from the crease
short of a length just outside off. Looks to pull but gets it off the high part of the bat. It trickles out to midwicket
length and just outside off, driven on the rise to sweeper cover
back of a length on middle stump. Shuffles and defends to square leg
full and just outside off, driven off the low part to mid-off
offcutter at a length just outside off. Opens the face and runs it down
length and turning in at middle stump. Punched to midwicket off the back foot
length at off stump, gets deep in the crease and flicks to deep square
length on leg stump, blocked on the front foot

shot! Expertly done by Perera. Not so expertly done by the fielder at deep point. Short of a length outside off and skidding into him. He backs away and chops it very late to get it past point. Mithun runs to his right, slides and tries to stop with his legs. Ends up nutmegging himself
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
lovely. Driven past mid-off. Full outside off and no turn, but he had to get his weight into this before caressing it past the fielder off the front foot
bouncer in the corridor. Shapes to pull but withdraws. Drops the bat to let it go
slower ball at a length, down leg side. Past the flick and they steal an extra run as the keeper fumbles diving to his right
offcutter at a length on off stump. Gets forward and guides it down to third man

chopped away. Lovely touch batting from Perera. Short of a length just outside off. Not even half a stride at this. Just stands tall and chops down at it to use the pace and get it between point and third man
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length and pushed across the corridor. Left alone
bouncer dug in very short. Also down leg side. But no wide call from either umpire as he lets this go
offcutter full and wide outside off, mistimed drive to point
slower ball at a length outside off, punched to sweeper on the up
length ball cuts in and gets him on the back thigh. He's looking to flick from off stump. Lbw appeal turned down, this is going down
slower ball short of a length outside off. Looks to defend and this jumps up at him to get glove
short of a length outside off, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
full slower ball outside off. Leans in and clips to midwicket off the front foot
short of a length in the corridor, nudged to point's left off the back foot

nearly a run out! Poor, hurried running from Sri Lanka and they nearly lose Perera. Slower length ball on leg stump, pushed into the midwicket region and he takes off straight away. Mustafiz picks up and throws at the stumps. He would have caught him well short with a direct hit
top edge clears keeper. Short and outside off. Looks for the pull but is late on it
slower ball at a length on leg stump, clipped into the midwicket region on the front foot
smacked off the middle but straight to square leg. Gets behind the line of this short one outside off and keeps the pull down
another very short bouncer starting down leg side. Another leave. And no wide signal yet again. This time Mendis shows his disappointment at that
length outside off, defended on the front foot through the covers
short of a length outside off, elegant late cut to find third man
short at the hips, hurried shovel down to fine leg
slower ball at a length outside off, leans in and taps to midwicket
short of a length outside off, chopped down to third man
full slower ball wide outside off. Guides it wide of extra cover and gives sweeper cover work to his left

a leaping stop at deep midwicket from Soumya. Short of a length ball just outside off. Mendis brings out the pull but only just gets the inside half of the bat on this. It dribbles away though and the fielder has to sprint a long way to his left from deep square to get to this
doesn't try to keep it down this time, and Soumya's sprint to the right is in vain. Slower ball, sort and wide outside off, slapped over point
slower ball at a length on off stump, defended down the pitch
bouncer outside off, shapes to pull and withdraws once again
short outside off, holds and angled bat up and deflects it down to third man
nicely placed! Short and up at his hips. Waiting on the back foot for this and gets on top of it to bisect fine leg and deep square with a pull
length on middle stump, defended off the back foot into the covers
length outside off, tapped on the rise to extra cover
short of a length at leg stump, allows it to come on and gently nudges this to the fine boundary. So much on offer there
length on leg stump, glance to fine leg

top edge on the hook, safely down to the fine leg boundary. Sri Lanka can't stop if they want to right now! Short and just up at his right shoulder. Decent delivery, has him hacking from underneath with no control. But life is cruel

short of a length outside off, sliced to third man's right and calls early to return for the second. Raucous applause from the home crowd. Hands on hips for Bangladesh's captain. This is domination at the moment
floated right up at off stump, jabs at it from the crease
short of a length at off stump, backs away, shows the stumps, chops it to point
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
full on off stump, driven with the turn to long-off
short of a length outside off, backs away and punches to sweeper cover
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, defended on the front foot
short of a length outside off, tapped to sweeper cover
offcutter at a length on middle stump. Defended to extra cover
slower ball on leg stump. Wants to flick, cops it on the pad
leading edge short of point. Another offbreak, leg stump and at a length. Closes the face too early on this
offbreak at a length, off stump. Check-drive to extra cover on the up
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
short at middle stump, pulled to long leg's left. Soumya gets around with a tumble and keeps it to one
short of a length outside off, cut to backward point

swept over midwicket on the rise! Incredible shot! Short of a length ball turning away outside off and somehow he's hit this off the front foot - a slog sweep on the rise. It hits the boundary padding. On the full, deems third umpire after a few replays
short of a length outside off, backs away and cuts to sweeper
short of a length on middle, pulled out to long leg
short of a length just outside off, punched on the rise to extra cover
length on middle stump, defended into the leg side off the back foot

dropped! Mahmudullah puts it down at long-on! Short ball just outside off, looks to pummel this with a pull on the front foot. Gets a leading edge that floats in front of Mahmudullah who runs forward, gets his hands on it but loses balance and puts it down. That shot on 28 is emblematic of Mendis' ODI average of 28
length outside off, punched into the covers
short outside off, shapes to pull and withdraws
length outside off, gets behind the line and tucks it to midwicket
tossed up at a length on off stump. Stays deep in the crease and pushes at this with hard hands, into the point region
length at off stump, tapped into the covers
length outside off, defended to point who is rapid in getting to this

drags it to the midwicket boundary and brings up hundred! His fifth ODI century. Total domination today from Perera. Gets low, on the front foot, and swipes this full ball from the stumps. Spreads his arms wide as soon as he hits this
length at off stump, tapped into the covers
length on middle stump, blocked on the front foot
beats deep square to the left. Short ball at middle stump, no pace on it at all. Lines it up and pulls it where he wants
length on middle stump, flicked to deep square
short outside off, pulled to deep square
length on middle stump, on the front foot to flick to midwicket who deflects it towards long-on
short outside off, late cut, can't beat backward point's dive to the right
full on off stump, driven down to long-off
short outside off, cut straight to backward point
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
tossed up outside off. Steps out and tucks this between deep midwicket and long-on

length on leg stump, nudged into the midwicket region. The bowler gets across, has a shy at the stump and gets it completely wide of the extra cover fielder backing up. Long-off cleans up as they come back for a second
tossed up outside off, sliced to short third's left
short of length outside off, goes back and pulls it towards long-on
length ball around off, stays back and punches it towards short midwicket
length ball around middle and leg, flicked towards square leg
a slower one around off, full but Mendis fails to take advantage, mistimes it towards long-off. 200 up for Sri Lanka, though
short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep extra cover
a slower bouncer, Perera was looking to give himself room but ends up palying an ugly forehand towards the left of short midwicket
slower one, full outside off, Mendis looks to dab it on the off side but closes the face of the bat too early and the ball hardly goes anywhere
fuller around off, a bit around-arm from Mahmudullah, Perera digs it out towards long-on
fuller on the pads and clipped away towards deep midwicket for a couple
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
short of length around off stump, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but ends up chopping it into the ground
length ball outside off, goes for the slog sweep, a big heave but misses
a floater around off stumps, bunts it on the leg side
another cutter outside off, steered towards deep extra cover to bring up the 100-run stand
fuller outside off, looks to reach there but cannot
a soft dismissal to end a scintillating knock. Was fuller on middle and leg, Perera looks to swipe it past short fine leg but doesn't get the timing right and an easy catch for Mustafizur there
a short one around off to welcome Mathews. Swivels to pull it down but ends up deflecting it on to his body
another short one and this time Mathews does better, pulls it towards square leg
length ball around off, looks to push it on the off side but the ball hits the inner half and rolls in front of square leg
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg for one
length ball around off, stays back and flicks it towards deep square leg
goes for the bouncer but too short and way too high, tennis-ball bounce there
length ball outside off, punched off the back foot but straight to extra cover
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards mid-off

short of length outside off, goes for the cut but looks like he missed it. A mild appeal for caught-behind but the umpire is unmoved. But wait, Kusal Mendis is walking! Bangladesh have pulled it back a bit here with two quick wickets
length ball around off, stays back and blocks it into the pitch
fuller and angling across, looks to drive it through covers but misses
length ball around off, moves across and flicks it towards short midwicket
short of length outside off and cuts it past the diving point fielder, what a way and what a shot to get off the mark
length ball around off and angling in, stays leg side of the ball and defends
clips away this length ball towards the left of deep midwicket
length ball around off, stays back and dabs it towards point
short of length around off, guides it towards third man, opening the face of the bat
short of length outside off, punches it towards extra cover
slower one around off, moves across and taps it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, flicks it towards square leg, uppish but lands just in front of the fielder there
length ball on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on and hares through for a single
fuller around off, hits it back towards the bowler who makes a partial stop in his followthrough, extra cover tidies up
short of length outside off, punched towards deep extra cover for a couple
short of length outside off, Mathews fetches it and pulls it towards the vacant deep midwicket area for four
fuller around off, drives but straight towards extra cover
short of length around off and another pull from the front foot, four more to deep midwicket
short of length outside off, steered towards point but Mustafizur has overstepped here, free hit coming up
a low full toss outside off, Mathews looks to go past mid-off but ends up hitting straight into the fielder's hands. Was a free hit, so no damage for either team
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep extra cover
length ball on middle and leg, clipped away towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on for one more
length ball around off, comes forward and works it towards the short midwicket
length ball on the stumps, pushes it gently towards long-on
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards extra cover
length ball around off, gives himself some room and hits it in the up but once again finds the extra cover
fuller around off, was a slower ball, mistimes it towards extra cover
another slower one, on middle and leg, Thirimanne stays leg side and dabs it towards short third man
short of length outside off, drags it towards short midwicket where a diving stop by the fielder keeps it to one
length ball on middle and leg, skips down the track and but is cramped for the room, dabs it towards covers for one
length ball around off, worked away towards square leg for one
length ball on the stumps, goes back and pulls it towards long-on
length ball around off, stays on the back foot and punches it towards long-on
length ball around off, pushed uppishly but well away from the bowler who dives to his right in vain
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on
length ball outside off, cuts it towards deep point for another single
length ball around off, Mathews is stuck on the crease and has no other option than to defend it
length ball around off, tucked away towards the left of long-on
length outside off, stays beside the line and steers it towards point
short of length outside off, stays back and punches it towards the right of third man
length ball on the stumps, goes for the pull but the ball hurries on to the batsman, and rolls towards the bowler
length ball on the stumps, hits it down the ground for a single to long-on
length ball around off, slower in the air, Thirimanne checks his cut, was in the air but away from the point fielder
fuller on the stumps, was looking to work it on the leg side, a leading edge towards extra cover
down the track and looks to hit towards long-on, the ball hits the inner half and goes towards deep midwicket
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
length around off, comes forward and works it towards midwicket for one
short of length outside off, Mathews goes back and finds short midwicket with the flick
fuller on the stumps, down the track and backs away, looks to drive it through covers but ends up mistiming it towards long-on
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot but straight towards extra cover
short of length and angling across, Mathews goes for the pull but doesn't time it, the bottom hand comes off but got enough on it to clear mid-on who chases it to keep it to two
fuller and wider outside off, Mathews was looking to give himself some room and cannot reach there in the end
goes for a short one but it's too high, loops towards the keeper
fuller outside off, Mathews looks to go over long-off but doesn't get the timing right as the bat rotates in his hand, one-bounce to the fielder there
short of length around middle, a mistimed pull towards deep midwicket for one
fuller and outside off, Thirimanne was coming down the track but that's too wide
length ball outside off, Thirimanne once again skips down and looks to go over covers, giving himself some room; cannot connect
fuller outside off, gets down on one knee and lofts it towards long-off
fuller on the stumps, works it towards deep midwicket but only a single
fuller around off, moves across and hits it towards long-on, along the ground
fuller outside off, slaps it towards sweeper cover, but once again only a single
a low full toss outside of, Thirimanne goes low and swipes it towards deep midwicket, comes back for the second
length ball around off, skips down the track and smashes it over the bowler's head for a much-needed boundary
length ball around off, stays back and pushes it towards extra cover, the fielder is at the edge of the circle
length ball around off, goes for the pull but not enough power behind it, Soumya takes a comfortable catch, moving to his left, at deep midwicket
fuller and wider outside off, drives it towards sweeper cover
length ball on the pads, helped towards deep-backward square leg for two
a bouncer to end the over with. Aimed at the batsman who ducks under it
a low full toss on the pads, clipped away towards deep square leg
no fireworks from Perera here. It's fuller around off, Perera looks to go aerial but ends up slicing it towards deep extra cover, Soumya comes in and takes it near knee-height
fuller around off, comes forward and flicks it towards wide long-on
fuller on the stumps, moves across and clips it towards short fine leg, an appeal for lbw but the umpire thinks there was some bat involved
length ball around off, stays back and works towards long-on
length ball outside off, steered towards point, a bit of fumble there allows a single
fuller around off, digs it out towards long-on for one
fuller outside off, goes for the drive but gets a thick outside edge, that will do though as the third man is wide
cheekily done, short of length outside off, dabs it past the keeper at the last moment but third man is quick enough to cut it off this time. A short run there at the non-striker's end but de Silva
short of length outside off, goes for the pull but gets an inside edge on the leg side
short and angling across but too high
another short one and another wide, Tamim doesn't look pleased
fuller, at the stumps, de Silva opens the face of the bat to steer it towards third man
fuller on the stumps, clears his front leg and digs it out towards long-off
fuller on the stumps, backs away and drives it towards long-on
fuller on the pads, looks to go aerial but doesn't time it but Mehidy makes a mess at deep square leg and deflects it towards the boundary
in the blockhole this time, digs it out towards long-off
fuller on the pads once again, flicked away towards fine leg for two more
length ball on the stumps, swiped away towards deep midwicket, 300 is up for Sri Lanka
slower length ball outside off, de Silva was looking to scoop it over but fails to connect
fuller outside off, drives it towards long-off but only a single
a low full on the stumps, de Silva gets low and swipes it towards midwicket
fuller around off, Mathews tries to get under it and clear long-off but doesn't get the required power and Sabbir takes a good sliding catch running in
fuller outside off, steers it towards point for one to bring Malinga on strike
length ball outside off, angling away from Malinga who looks to steer it away, misses
short of length from the bowler, Malinga backs away and pulls it towards the right of deep midwicket, comes back for the second with crowd applauding
fuller on the pads and helped away past short fine leg by de Silva for four
fuller on the stumps and de Silva goes aerial but no timing on it and Sabbir takes an easy catch at long-on
slower length ball outside off, Malinga backs away and hits it towards wide long-off, two more to the legend
slower length ball outside off, Malinga looks to get his bat on it, cannot
fuller but down the leg side, this has been that sort of day
slower one around off, Malinga looks to hammer it over the bowler's head but misses
another slower one outside off, Malinga mistimes it towards long-on and that allows them to come back for the second
dangles it at driving length outside off, it hints at swinging back in but holds the line and goes through to the keeper
length and some shape in at middle stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
overpitched and down leg side. Can't get bat on this
full inswinger at leg stump. Manages to get the bat in front of the stride and poke this to square leg
full toss at off stump, awkward delivery defended awkwardly

welcome to the last chapter! Wow! Malinga has shown up with a classic. Dipping, nasty yorker comes in very very late from a middle stump line. Tamim's reflexive stride across has him locked, and then it's too late to take it out. It's under his bat and it smashes leg stump. Bangladesh's stand-in captain can barely stand up as this craftsman sneaks it past him
short of a length and swung away outside off, left alone
length ball just outside off, defended to point off the front foot
past the edge. Magic delivery. Beats a length just outside off and gets it to straighten past the swish
length and just outside off. Pokes at it again and gets an inside edge down to fine leg
length at middle stump, defended into the midwicket region on the front foot
length ball outside off, blocked on the front foot
short of a length at middle stump, pushed down the pitch off the back foot

lbw appeal is reviewed. Another big inswinging yorker. Was that going down? Sarkar was rapped on the boot and then pad. Outside the line of leg stump, seemingly. And then on the bat. Not a great review, that is not hitting the stumps
full inswinger just outside off, defended into the covers on the front foot
bouncer at the throat, does well to keep the bat down and get out of the way
length and swung in at the pad. Looks to flick but can only deflect this to the keeper's right
outside edge as he squares him up. Length ball shaping away from middle. A nervous prod from the batsman, but he's played with soft enough hands to be safe in the slip cordon
inside edge onto pad. A low full toss swung away outside off. He looks to defend with a closed face
length outside off, mistimed drive on the up to mid-off's right
a handsome shot. Length and some width outside off. Gets on the front foot and chips this wide of mid-off on the up
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
full and just outside off, punched wide of mid-off again. Slightly aerial, but held his shape on that. Nicely done
length outside off, punched to mid-off
chipped over square leg this time. Full ball angled in at middle and he uses that to lean in, get underneath it and give Malinga some running to his right from fine leg
inside edge as Sarkar has an ungainly swish at this slower full toss. No clue with that as it floated outside off
outside edge flies past second slip! Short of a length and curving away in the corridor. He slashes and gets relatively good connection on this to clear that fielder
another attempted slower ball yorker. This is down leg side though
length ball curving away outside off, defended solidly into the covers
lands the slower ball, but picked this time. Dips full at middle stump and he defends into the leg side
short of fine leg. Short ball on the chest, hooks aerially to that fielder's left, but safely enough in the end
just keeps it out! Inswinging yorker at leg stump. Sarkar's lack of feet movement means he has room to bring the bat down on this. Just in time.
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, defended into the off side
whipped down to fine leg. Length ball angled into leg stump, met with an expansive flick
falls short of fine leg again. Malinga there this time. Short ball at off stump, too late on the pull. The top edge doesn't carry
short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
misfield at cover gives them a run. Sarkar keeping the style. Nice stride as he drove this length ball on the up
low full toss thuds into the pad as he misses on the flick shot
full and swung into the pad again. Looks to flick, misses again, but this trickles down to fine leg
beats the outside edge. Swung away from a length outside off, hanging bat
nicely timed. Length and swinging away outside off. Keeps the bat close to his body as he leans into this and stabs it past point
short of a length outswinger in the channel, defended to backward point off the back foot
bouncer dug in too short. Can't get bat on that outside off
short of fine leg again. Bouncer at helmet height, top edge on the attempted hook
length ball at off stump, pushed down the pitch and into the stumps as Pradeep tries to get a finger on it
length in the corridor, opens the face and defends to point

Mithun reviews the lbw decision. It was a length ball outside off, he was walking across into the off side to try and flick behind square. Struck on the front pad. Outside the line or not? Not! No bat on it either. This is hitting middle and off. Bangladesh lose the wicket and the review
length and in at off stump, defended off the back foot
length on middle stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
past the inside edge. Inswinging yorker wide outside off. He looks to open the face and chop this to third man
inswinging yorker at leg stump. Does nicely to watch this closely and keep it out

see ya! Persistence will do it! He is not hiding his cards tonight. Three yorkers in a row - but what are you going to do about it? Sarkar tries the only plausible method - the good old full face of the bat to try and defend it. But this goes through and hits leg stump anyway, possibly off the inside edge on the way
past the outside edge. Late outswinger from a length in the corridor, a nervous poke from Mahmudullah
squared up but just enough bat to survive. Length ball, outswinger from a middle stump line and he pushes with hard hands and no feet
jammed into the turf as he gets the bottom of the bat on this outswinging yorker outside off. Mendis leaps to catch it on the bounce
length ball at middle stump from wide of the crease, defended into the leg side
full and just outside off, driven to extra cover off the front foot
length, slanted in at middle stump. Defended off the inside half
shot! Short of a length at middle stump, delivered from closer to the stumps this time. Rahim is onto it. Quick move backwards and then swivels to get this past the leg umpire
nicely timed. Big stride across off stump on the front foot, but gets bat on this length ball to get it wide of mid-on
short of a length on off stump, defended into the covers
short of a length, just outside off. Tapped to cover off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, carved nicely to point's left but his outstretched hand means only a single at third man
inside half on the back foot defence. Length ball comes in with the angle
short of a length just outside off. Runs it to point's left and has time to protest with his partner that there's a run in there. They don't take it in the end
short and wide outside off, cut to point's right
length outside off, defended to point on the front foot
length outside off, sliced on the rise to third man's right. Malinga runs across and offers his right boot to stop this
beaten on the cut. Short and jumping up wide outside off
too quick. Short and in the corridor. Mahmudullah wants to carve it through the covers, but it is past him rapidly
length on off stump, defended off the back foot

guides it straight to third man! 142kph from Kumara and Mahmudullah can't do more than ramp this. No swinging room at his chest. Third man moves to his left and hangs on to a simple one. Bangladesh crumbling
full and just outside off. Hurriedly tapped down the pitch off the toe-end
short of a length at off stump, shuffles and clips to deep square
short of a length outside off, left alone
beaten. Short of a length outside off. Looks to cut
length on middle stump, flicked to deep square
appeal for catch behind. Short of a length ball lifts up steeply as Rahim tries to run it down
length outside off, defended into the covers on the front foot
a 143kph bouncer but too short and sails over the keeper's head for five wides
cracking shot. Short and wide and slapped away past backward point for four
length ball around off, Sabbir stays behind the line and blocks
fuller, in the blockhole at the off stump, Sabbir works it out towards mid-off
length ball around off, punched towards mid-off from the crease
another short one and once again way over the keeper's head for five wides
length ball around off, stays in the crease and taps it towards cover-point
goes for the yorker but ends up bowling a full toss on middle stump, pushed towards mid-on
length ball, jags back in after landing to beat the bat, hits the batsman high on back thigh
Mushfiqur goes inside out to this length ball but cannot beat mid-off but the fielder there fumbles and allows a run
another short one, Sabbir goes for the pull, gets a top edge that flies over the keeper's head
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it in the direction of cover
another short one, but this time it's down the leg side
a touch fuller and width outside off, Sabbir slashes it through covers for four. Runs flowing in for Bangladesh
slower length ball outside off, Sabbir flat-bats it off the back foot and beats the mid-off on his right for another boundary
short of length around off, moves across and dabs it towards square leg for a quick single
another short one, goes for the pull, doesn't time it to perfection but will get a single to square leg
fuller on the stumps, Mushfiqur comes forward and pushes it towards mid-on
short of length around off, dabbed towards square leg for a single
fuller on the pads and flicked away towards midwicket, Pradeep chases to keep it to three
ends the over with a short one outside off, Mushfiqur sways away from the line
length ball around off, Sabbir was looking to work it on the leg side, gets an inside edge on to the pads
length ball around off and Sabbir pulls it off the front foot, beats Malinga at mid-on to his right for four
short of length around off, pulled away towards backwards square leg for one
short of length around off, stays back and taps it towards cover-point
short of length around off, punched towards cover from the back foot
short of length outside off, swivels to pull it in front of square, but only a single
starts with a bouncer once more, Mushfiqur stays away from the line of it
short of length outside off, dabs it towards point from the back foot
short of length around middle and off, moves across and flicks it behind square leg, sprints back for the second
fuller on the stumps and flicked past short midwicket, Thirimanne puts in the chase from deep square leg but the ball just beats his slide
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg
short of length around off, punched past extra cover but Malinga puts in slide at mid-off to make the stop, big cheer for the champion bowler
length ball around off, comes forward and plays it with the spin towards square leg
short of length around off, Mushfiqur goes back and works it towards extra cover where Mathews makes a sliding stop
length ball on the stumps, tucked away behind square on the leg side
fuller on the leg stump, looks to go for the fine sweep, the ball hits the gloves and rolls towards short fine leg
length ball, pitching around off and middle and spinning down the leg side
fuller on the stumps, flicks it towards square leg for one more
fuller around off, pushed gently in the direction of extra cover
140kph, short of length outside off, around sixth stump, Sabbir leaves it alone, perhaps was expecting to it bounce a lot more than it did
a touch fuller outside off, stand and deliver from the batsman but finds the stumps at the other end
fuller on the stumps, flicked away towards mid-on where Pradeep puts in the slide but pushes the ball further away and allows batsmen to come back for the second
short of length outside off and pulled away disdainfully in front of square, the deep square leg fielder had no chance
fuller on the pads, Sabbir misses the flick and gets struck on the pads, an appeal for lbw but that was going down
length ball around off, stays back and defends
fuller on middle and leg, comes forward and works it towards short fine leg but the fielder there was quick to the ball
brings out the reverse sweep and beats the man at short third man, uses the bowler's pace intelligently
length ball from middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
length ball on the stumps, Sabbir almost chips it back towards the bowler
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards square leg
length again but much slower in the air this time, glances it towards short fine leg
fuller outside off, slashes it aerially, inches away from extra cover who flung himself to his left
short of length this time and pulled away towards square leg
length ball around off, comes forward and punches it towards cover
slower length ball around off, defends it back towards the bowler from the crease
short of length outside off, opens the face on the impact to work it towards third man
an attempted bouncer, Sabbir goes for a pull but ends up top-edging it towards square leg, the fielder in the deep cannot reach there in time as it lands well in front
a bit casual from Malinga there at deep backward square leg allows the second run
fuller on the pads and swept fine by Sabbir, beating Malinga on his right
length ball on the stumps, goes back and pushes it towards long-on
fuller on the pads, comes forward and places it gently behind square leg, Malinga fires in the throw but that's an easy two
fuller around off, comes forward and drops it towards cover-point for one more
length ball around off, defended from the crease
length ball on the stumps, Mushfiqur moves across and scoops it over the keeper's head for a one-bounce four
a short one from Perera this time and Mushfiqur swivels to pull it towards deep square leg
another short one from Perera, in the line of the stumps, Sabbir ducks under as the ball bounces once more after passing the batsman
a low full toss on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on
fuller around middle and leg, drives it towards the left of mid-on for a quick single, a direct hit from Pradeep there but Mushfiqur was well home
short of length outside off, pulls it down towards midwicket for one to bring up his fifty off just 42 balls
length ball around off, goes back and flicks it towards long-on
length ball on the leg stump, nudged towards short fine leg
length ball on middle and leg, worked towards square leg by Sabbir
length ball on the pads, fired in this time, Mushfiqur turns it towards short fine leg
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
length again, on the pads this time, flicked away towards deep square leg
short of length around off and middle, dabs it behind square leg for one
short of length outside off, pulled off the front foot but straight towards short midwicket
short of length outside off, goes for the pull but not in control at all, gets a top edge that lobs over short midwicket
length outside off, comes forward and drives it towards deep extra cover
short and wide outside off, cut away towards deep point
another bouncer but angling down the leg side this time, Sabbir helps it towards fine leg
fuller on the leg stumps, Sabbir looks to flick and misses, gets hit on the pads
pitched up once again, driven towards short midwicket where Karunaratne makes an excellent sliding stop
fired in on the pads, clipped away towards square leg, the fielder fails to pick it cleanly and allows the second run
fuller on the pads and swept towards fine leg
length ball on the pads, flicks it towards short fine leg but no run this time, hit too hard
length ball around off and middle, backs away and pushes it towards cover-point for one more
length ball outside off, stays beside the line and chops it behind the point fielder
length ball on the stumps, cramps the batsman who chips it towards mid-on
a full toss around off stumps, pushes it on the leg side for a quick single, short midwicket intercepts
back-of-the-hand slower one outside off, Mushfiqur waits for it before cutting it towards deep point, sweeper cover cuts it off
fuller on the stumps, flicked away towards deep midwicket for a single
fuller around off, comes forward and drives firmly down the wicket, Pradeep throws himself to his left and makes a one-handed stop
a full toss on the stumps, Mushfiqur comes down the track and hits it towards long-on, 150 up for Bangladesh

skips down the track to this length ball outside leg stump, doesn't reach to the pitch of the ball but goes through with the shot anyway, doesn't get the required power and an easy catch for Fernando at deep midwicket
fuller on the stumps, drives it gently towards long-on
length ball on the pads, flicked towards short fine leg
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards square leg for a quick single
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on for one more
a slower yorker but down the leg side, an enquiry for caught-behind but not-out says the umpire but doesn't signal a wide, was nowhere near the pad
short one but once again down the leg side, Mosaddek fails to connect the pull shot but called a wide this time
another bouncer down the leg side, helped on its way towards fine leg
a slower, low full toss, Mushfiqur works it towards square leg
another slower full toss on the stumps, pushes it towards short midwicket
a quick bouncer around off, Mosaddek looks to pulls it down but misses
length ball down the leg side, goes for the pull but misses, an appeal for caught-behind but the umpire stretches his hands to signal a wide. Was very close to the bat though
short of length around off and middle and pulled away in front of square, the fielder in the deep had no chance
dropped short at middle stump, gets deep in the crease and guides the pull between deep midwicket and deep square. Midwicket runs across and flicks it back in for his partner
full on middle stump, flicked to midwicket's right and a bit of confusion with the tun. But that is the run that brings up his fifty. He's kept them in the game
short of midwicket. A harmless chip as he looks to flick without getting to the pitch of this outside off
length outside off, stabbed into the point region off the back foot
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right
length outside off, hurriedly tapped to extra cover off the back foot
length outside off, big stride and then an open face for the single at third man
that's gone wrong. Length ball way down leg side. Mendis skips across and gets a mitt on this so fine leg can retrieve it
full on middle stump, flicked straight to midwicket
full outside off, driven straight to point
expertly done. Slower ball goes own leg side ad he waits on it before tickling it fine
lbw appeal turned down. Another slower ball, pitching on length and hitting the pad as he looks to flick. Going down leg
short at leg stump, climbs above it and controls the hook down to fine leg
length on middle stump, punched to midwicket off the back foot
full on middle, can't beat midwicket to his left with the drive
length outside off, dropped into the off side with soft hands
length and down leg side, left alone
length at middle, tucked to deep square's left
length on middle stump, run to short fine off the front foot
full on middle, looks to flick and gets a leading edge that lands well short of the bowler
short and in the corridor. Looks to cut but this pings off the thick outside edge to third man
short of a length and in at off stump. Opens the face and jabs this to third man

brainfreezes abound! Slow-mo cricket! No-mo cricket if you're Mosaddek. Short ball down leg side, looks to pull but it's past him. Mendis leaps to his left to try and get this. He can only parry it upwards for himself. It appears the batsman thinks the ball is now past the keeper because Rahim is running down at the other end. So he's taking a walk around short-of-a-length whereabouts. Mendis is still juggling the ball. And has almost resigned, because he's REALLY struggling to hold on. Then he sees where the batsman is. Now he has the ball, and his right glove is off. Takes aim for an eternity as Mosaddek turns around and pauses life. Crunch. Ball hits base of stump.
short of a length outside off, on his toes to punch this to sweeper cover
short of a length on middle stump, cramped on the punch, drops it into the pitch
short of a length at off stump. On top of the bounce, opens the face and runs it to third man
a muffled slog out to long-on. Length at middle, steps out and can't time this. It's off the inside half of the bat
short of a length on middle stump, on the back foot to whip this to long-on
appeal for lbw as he looks to reverse sweep and is struck in front of the stumps. But it's pitched outside leg
length on middle, nudged to deep square
close call on the lbw. Shuffles a long way to try and flick a length ball, struck in front of middle and off. That was in line, but turned down

got him! De Silva turning the game vigorously in Sri Lanka's way. Although this is an arm ball. Skidding across the corridor from around the wicket. Mehidy looks for the cute stab past short third. Thin edge and Mendis is probably going to write to us tomorrow to label him a full-time wicketkeeper. What a night he's having
short of a length outside off, opens the face and chops to third man
bouncer rising steeply at an off stump line. Shafiul jumps out of the way to let it go
very short and outside off. Left alone
short at and the body. Fishes and is beaten
short and rising past off stump. More fishing, more missing
floats through the vacant gully region. Short ball at the chest and he finally manages to get something on a bouncer. Fends awkwardly, down to third man
slower short ball, wide outside off. Cut to sweeper cover
beaten. Short of a length outside off, backs away for the cut but this goes on with the angle
length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket's right
length on middle stump, turning in as he gets forward and smothers this
length on leg stump, gets forward and flicks to midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to deep backward square
length on leg stump, poked to square leg off the front foot
slower ball at a length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg
off the pad and down to fine leg. Inswinger but sliding down leg side
slower ball at a length on off stump. Defended to point
full outside off, punches to mid-off and Shafiul just survives at the other end as Thisara's throw misses. He was lazily plonking the bat in
full slower ball down leg side, left alone
slower length ball down leg side, beaten on the flick
slower ball at a length on leg stump, clipped straight to midwicket
periscoped down to fine leg. Short ball at an off stump line, swishes from under it and gets a top edge

taken down leg side! Mendis moving quickly. Rahim has been limping, his feet weren't as quick as he stepped into the off side to try and ramp this fine. Got bat on it but hardly the connection he wanted. That should be that, surely?
full and just outside off, sliced to point's right

top of off! Pradeep is swarmed by his team-mates who are no doubt telling him to leave on for Malinga. Regulation length ball aimed for top of off. Shafiul defends inside the line and is beaten on the outside edge
length ball in the corridor, straightens after angling in and beats the outside edge
past the edge and over the stumps. Short of a length and angled in at the body. Squared up. Mendis appeals! Can you believe him!
swatted over point who gives chase and pulls this in. Short ball in the corridor, looks to pull and has no intention of getting the ball there. He doesn't have a say in this
beaten. Offcutter at a length outside off, ripping past the outside edge as he hangs the bat out
low full toss just outside off. Looks to crash it through the off side, gets it to mid-on off the inside part of the toe-end
beaten. Slower ball at a length in the corridor. Looks to slug this to Mirpur, misses by a long way
slower ball at a length on middle stump, squares him up as he gets on the back foot to defend. Thick outisde edge to point's right
length outside off, whirlwind batswing nails the drive. Can't get it wide of mid-off
he keeps it out! Slower, dipping yorker on off stump. Rubel with the whirlwind out again...or so it seems until he stops and jams the bat down on this
drilled! That's vicious. Full ball outside off, gets his front leg into the leg side and clubs this from underneath to the extra cover boundary
outside edge is past second slip's dive to the left. Length ball in at middle stump, gets the front leg up in protection and flamingo edges this
full toss wide outside off. Mustafiz walks into the leg side, shows all three stumps...and leaves
past the head. Short ball honing in at him. He gets on the floor and manages to let it go
falls safely between deep point, who is running fast at this, and Malinga at third man, who isn't quite interested. Full ball at the stumps, backs away and scythes it high off the outside edge
wide of third slip this time! Mustafiz keeps exposing the stumps and miraculously getting bat at full balls aimed at middle. One more down at third man. His highest ODI score
clubbed to the midwicket boundary. Ten and 11 having the time of their lives! Slower ball at a length on middle stump, clears the front leg and connects on the slog
yorker at off stump, watchfully jammed out to cover
an absolute video game glitch of a forward defence from Rubel. Slower length ball. He's down expecting a yorker, but is forced to get bat on this. Pushes it wide of first slip

goes in style! Lasith Malinga seals the win in another chase. Seals it with a dipping slower ball. Mustafizur backs away and manages to connect again, but he's hit it high and to the right of Thisara at mid-off who does it for everyone in the stadium after some serious balancing
